column1: Baby Barnaby's////My cousins and I were looking for a place to brunch at that we could actually be seated at a timely manner without having to make reservations and thought this was a good choice. I guess we were just really lucky that day
column2: from finding a spot right next to the restaurant to getting seated within 10 minutes cause this place was hellaaa small and packed when we came at around noon
column3: or at least the baby barnaby's section of it. Like good Lord y'all gotta suck in your gut if you wanna navigate around that place.
